cast.name: 温蒂·麦科尔姆 Wendy McColm
内森·斯图尔特-贾瑞特 Nathan Stewart-Jarrett
诺拉·柯克帕特里克 Nora Kirkpatrick

introduction: The movie takes place in a serene vacation home in the Palm Springs desert. A young woman (Wendy McColm) arrives there with her friends, a slightly older married couple (Nora Kirkpatrick and Matt Peters), and the couple are subjecting her to a rather intense version of a blind date: a single man (Nathan Stewart-Jarrett) she's never met will soon be joining them for the weekend. Like any jaded millennial, the woman greets the impending setup with a sense of dread: "These things never work out!" she says on the car ride out. But, when her suitor arrives, things don't go quite as expected
